channel.title: [HELP] How to cast Magic and Range npcs? [HELP]
channel.description: Alright, I gave them hp and stuff etc. but I cannot range them or cast magic. and I cannot auto recharge hp, someone help (I want it to be 10 seconds 1hp recharged, and working food. coz my food won't work)
